group.title: Job in Cisco, India | Interview Questions | CTC | Work Culture | Off-Campus
group.author: luv
group.excerpt: Every year Cisco hires a lot of software engineers but a lot of students have a doubt about applying for Cisco due to it being a networking company.

group.title: Inversion Count and Range Sum Querries using BIT
group.author: luv
group.excerpt: Inversion Count and Range Sum Queries are two failry medium questions which can be solved easily using Binary Indexed Trees.

group.title: Binary Indexed Trees / Fenwick Trees Tutorial
group.author: luv
group.excerpt: Binary Indexed Trees(BIT) is considered as an advanced data structure but it's quite easy to implement and use and has a lot of applications in CP as well
